page.title: 19NEWTON VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: LISA KINGSTON AGE 8 OUR SCHOOL IS 108 YEARS OLD.THE WALLS ARE MADE OUT OF BRICK STONE LIME-STONE & SAND-STONE THEIR USE TO BE TWO BIG FIRE-PLACES IN THE SECOND AND THIRD CLASSES.THE SCHOOL IS ONLY LITTLE BECAUSE IT HAS ONLY GOT THREE CLASS-ROOMS.THERE ARE THREE TEACHERS MRS RAINBOW IS THE INFANT TEACHER MRS EMMS IS THE 1ST AND 2ND YEAR JUNIOR TEACHER,MR HANDLEY IS THE 3RD & 4TH YEAR JUNIOR TEACHER.WE HAVE AN ASSEMBLY EVERY DAY,MR HANDLEY HAS HIS ON MONDAYS,TUESDAYS & THURSDAYS.MRS RAINBOW TAKES SINGING ON A FRIDAY. IN P.E.WE PLAY ON THE CLIMBING FRAME THE RED AND GREEN BOXES,THE RED MATS AND THE CRASH MAT.FOR MATHS WE DO DIVISON,MULTIPLICATION,ADDING AND TAKING.FOR LANGUAGE WE DO COMPREHENTION AND SPELLINGS.IN CRAFT LESSONS WE MAKE THINGS & PAINT.
